budge.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: to move, or to make someone or something move
budge.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: She leaned on the door, but it wouldn’t budge.
The horse refused to budge an inch.
Will hasn’t budged from his room all day.
budge.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: to change your opinion, or to make someone change their opinion
budge.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: The government has refused to budge.
He won’t budge on the issue.
Treacy refuses to budge from his principles.
